duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide basic level of general nursing care to forensic patients with mental, emotional, or developmental disabilities.
Develop and encourage participation in and supervision for patient activities.
Administer oral medications, perform custody tasks, maintain patient’s optimal motor function, and perform treatments and procedures.
Work with other disciplines as part of the treatment team to provide an overall treatment program for the patients.

education_certification.credential: Possession of a valid license to practice as an LVN issued by the California Board of Vocational Nurse and Psychiatric Technician Examiners.
Knowledge of fundamentals of nursing care.
